ygData.subject: Re: Defending a Friend.
ygData.msgSnippet: The Hero: Ouch, damn, that hurt. Hey, people, can somebody put my head back on? Hmm? Technosis walks out of the base. Feeling guilty that she did nothing at

Subject: Re: Defending a Friend.

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal

X-Mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.3018.1300
From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

The Hero: Ouch, damn, that hurt. Hey, people, can somebody put my head back
on? Hmm?

Technosis walks out of the base. Feeling guilty that she did nothing at all.
Suddenly, Termitron had run by screaming about someone's death, or
something.

Technosis: Who's dead? Who's dead? Who's dead?

The Hero: Hey!

Technosis: Everyone had better get to a CR Chamber, fast. We have four,
after all.

Technosis puts The Hero's head back on.

The Hero: I ran him off.

The Hero smiles and mech fluid runs down his neck. Then he frowns. Technosis
picks up Perplex. He wasn't that big, but Technosis was smaller, so she had
a little trouble, but she took him inside and put him into a CR Chamber.
Technosis walked back out.

The Hero: Ouch, ouch, ouch.

Technosis: I put Perplex in a CR Chamber, we still have 3 CR Chambers
open...
